item.description:
90 Minute Endurance Karting Race at the indoor F1 Boston Joint track.

$300 per team. ($100 per person + $3 for CC processing fee)

Minimum 5 pit stops during the race.

This will translate to 30 minute track time per driver, which can be split into two 15 min. stints per driver.

The top 6 finishers from the March 25th, April 27th and May 18th endurance races are eligible to participate in the Finals at the F1 Outdoor track on Wed June 24th at 5:00pm at a cost of $100 per team.

Participating in this race does not obligate you to participate in the Finals.

One among the three of you will have to volunteer to be the Team Leader and be responsible for overseeing pitstops.

Once the 3 spots are filled, the registration with payment will be submitted to F1 Boston, after which F1 Boston's refund policy will dictate.

If the 3 spots are filled, and F1 Boston sells out of spots for the day, the meetup will be canceled and the money refunded.

If the 3 spots are not filled up, the meetup will be canceled and the payment will be refunded to those who paid.

More details about the endurance race can be found at Rules and Procedures
item.name: 90 minute Endurance - Team "More Velocity RMG"
